pp1.5:2.1_0: Atthekacco puggalo ārabhati ca vippaṭisārī ca hoti,
pp1.5:2.1_2: yatthassa te uppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhanti.
pp1.5:2.2_0: Atthekacco puggalo ārabhati na vippaṭisārī ca hoti,
pp1.5:2.2_2: yatthassa te uppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhanti.
pp1.5:2.3_0: Atthekacco puggalo nārabhati vippaṭisārī ca hoti,
pp1.5:2.3_2: yatthassa te uppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhanti.
pp1.5:2.4_0: Atthekacco puggalo nārabhati na vippaṭisārī hoti,
pp1.5:2.4_2: yatthassa te uppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhanti.
pp1.5:2.5_0: Atthekacco puggalo nārabhati na vippaṭisārī hoti,
pp1.5:2.5_2: yatthassa te uppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhanti.
pp1.5:3.1_0: Datvā avajānāti, saṁvāsena avajānāti, ādheyyamukho hoti, lolo hoti, mando momūho hoti.
